title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added comprehensive documentation on email addresses, including concepts, troubleshooting guides, and reference material.
Clarified Azure DevOps licensing for Enterprise Managed Users and data residency requirements.
Introduced GPT-5 mini model in Copilot with updates to model comparison, hosting, and availability docs.
Restructured email preference content and moved marketing emails article to notifications section.
Updated CHANGELOG for GPT-5 public preview in Copilot.
summary:
- Added comprehensive documentation on email addresses, including concepts, troubleshooting guides, and reference material.
- Clarified Azure DevOps licensing for Enterprise Managed Users and data residency requirements.
- Introduced GPT-5 mini model in Copilot with updates to model comparison, hosting, and availability docs.
- Restructured email preference content and moved marketing emails article to notifications section.
- Updated CHANGELOG for GPT-5 public preview in Copilot.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
